issue.title: [CF 754] Resource Condition: Vengeance
issue.body:
Since protection warriors require a certain amount of vengeance before shield barrier eclipses shield block, it would be useful if TellMeWhen could check for the amount of vengeance with a condition.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #754 | Raw

comments.body:
You can do this with the "Buff - Aura Variable" condition.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Alright, didn't realize that was possible.


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer

:) That's what I'm here for!


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
